<h1>easily generate options</h1>

Run this, specifying either <em>options<em> or <em>options-jailname</em> for <strong>PORT_DBDIR</strong>. Also set <strong>BULK_LIST</strong> to the path of your list of ports for bulk build.

    <verbatim>
PORT_DBDIR=/usr/local/etc/poudriere.d/options
BULK_LIST=/root/poudriere.list
mkdir -p ${PORT_DBDIR}
while read origin; do make PORT_DBDIR=${PORT_DBDIR} -C /usr/ports/${origin} config-conditional config-recursive; done < ${BULK_LIST}
</verbatim>
